name: Virtual Crokinole
description:
-3D graphics with simulated physics
-Play against the AI with 3 different difficulty levels
-Compete in 2 player mode
-Intuitive single point control system to aim and shoot

Crokinole is a dexterity table-top board game that combines elements of billiards and strategy. Players take turns shooting discs across a circular playing surface, trying to have their discs land in higher-scoring regions of the board, while also attempting to knock away opposing discs.
